title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Error message not displayed when opening a file already opened in another editor
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If a file is already opened in one editor, it should display an error message when attempting to open it in another editor.
OB: Currently, when a file that is already opened in one editor is opened in another editor, no warning or error message is displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed informing the user that the file is already opened in another editor and cannot be opened in multiple editors concurrently.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Try to open the same file in another editor.
3. Note that no warning or error message is displayed.
